quotes.author: Babe Ruth
quotes.quote: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.

quotes.author: Brian Tracy
quotes.quote: There is never enough time to do everything, but there is always enough time to do the most important thing.

quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

quotes.author: Judy Garland
quotes.quote: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else.
